Support Us
Without support from our community we simply couldn’t provide the high quality entertainment and enrichment that we are known for. Support can come in many forms, including sponsorship, donations, and volunteering hours. Use the links to the right to learn more about each. And thanks for your continuing support of our programs!

About
Experience the Extraordinary at the
Alan Jay Wildstein Center for the Performing Arts. We look forward to welcoming you to the  #1 entertainment venue in Florida’s Heartland.
South Florida State College’s Performing Arts program has been providing affordable, high-quality entertainment in Florida’s Heartland since 1984. We present a variety of over 30 performances per year in the 1460 seat Wildstein Center. Past performances include: The Beach Boys, Johnny Mathis, Kenny Rogers, Vienna Boys Choir, Jay Leno, Polish Baltic Orchestra, St. Petersburg Ice Ballet, Peking Acrobats, Three Dog Night, Black Violin and national Broadway tours.
Subscription packages, group discounts and a 5-for-15 discount is available for most performances.
SEE YOU AT THE SHOW!

2025 – 2026 MEMBERSHIPS
Support the Arts.
Enjoy the Perks.
You are invited to join our tax-deductible membership program. Membership gifts support our artistic and educational programming and maintenance of the state-of-the-art equipment at the Wildstein Center for the Performing Arts, while providing you with special Member Benefits at the same time.
Membership ranges from $50 – $1000 and all members receive a coupon book with offers and discounts from local businesses valued at $300.  Plus, each membership level gets you access to the best choice of available seats before each show goes on sale to the general public.   The shows you want…the time of day you want to see them…and the best seats in the house!
Each membership level has a designated time period for ticket purchasing prior to the general public.   The membership campaign begins  Monday May 5, 2025.
Member only ticket sales begin in July.
Become a Member Today!

Members pay $1 per ticket processing fee until Friday, Sept. 26 , 2025.  After Sept. 26, 2025, the ticket processing fee is $3 per ticket.
There is a $10 phone fee for phone orders
.

Box Office hours:  Monday, Wednesday, and Thursday, 11:30 a.m. – 2:30 p.m and one hour before show time at the Wildstein Center and the University Center.
Summer hours vary.
For questions about accessibility, contact Karen Pelski at 863-784-7284.
Please Note: Due to the high call volumes, we may not be able to answer your call immediately, please leave a message and your call will be returned within 24 hours.
